A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Without a doubt\, this is the worst movie in the Star Wars saga.  An excess of humor without grace\, appalling performances\, removing that of Mark Hamill.  The script is the one who has the most fault\, it is long and sometimes boring I do not find any emotion in the film\, except for 2 moments that I will later count in spoilers.  The only salvageable thing is the bso\, which is a wonder of John Williams\, but even so it is also one of the weakest in the series.  I have seen it three times and it does not completely convince me.
